Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

Goal Description
play:add-app-resource Adds application resources ('app' directory) to Play! application.
play:add-app-source Adds application sources ('app' directory) to Play! application.
play:add-module-app-resources Adds dependent modules resources ('app' directories) to Play! application.
play:add-module-app-sources Adds dependent modules sources ('app' directories) to Play! application.
play:add-test-resource Adds application test resources ('test' directory) to Play! application.
play:add-test-source Adds application test sources ('test' directory) to Play! application.
play:test Run Play! application unit tests
play:uberzip Package Play! framework and Play! application as one ZIP achive (standalone distribution).
play:war Package Play! framework and Play! application as a WAR achive.
play:zip Package Play! application as a ZIP achive.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven 2.0.3
JDK 1.5
Memory No minimum requirement.
Disk Space No minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>com.google.code.maven-play-plugin</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-play-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>1.0.0-alpha1</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.google.code.maven-play-plugin</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-play-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.0.0-alpha1</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
